# Before opening a pull request

- \[ \] `pre-commit run --all-files`
- \[ \] Run your code through [pylint](https://pylint.readthedocs.io/en/latest/). `pylint --recursive=y --rcfile=.pylintrc .`. All warnings but `fixme` must be addressed.

# Before Merging

- \[ \] `Squash & Merge`
